name: Storm Swordsman
description:
The player will play the role of a wandering swordsman, who is entrusted by a friend who has not seen him for many years.
Carry out a secret assassination mission of the state, and fight to the death with ninjutsu and sword masters encountered in Benming country on the way.
Will the player be able to complete this difficult task or will they become the dead under the sword?
Or keep getting stronger and eventually become the strongest swordsman?


《The game has a total of 12 regions and five cities to conquer, and there are 17 powerful master bosses waiting for you to challenge!》
《The game style is closer to the rhythm and difficulty of Dark Souls. It is more suitable for hard-core gamers who like challenges.》

▉ Game Battle
The combat moves that can be carried out are,
Jump, Dash, Defense, Light Slash, Heavy Slash, Backstab, Counterattack, and five skills.
Players have three values ​​of physical strength, vigor, and endurance.
And thirty skill scrolls that can change abilities can be equipped.
Players need to make good use of these skill combinations to fight against a variety of powerful opponents!


▉ Game Characters
The role played by the player, the partner who performs the assassination mission.
And all kinds of masters blocking in front of the player.


▉ Operation Method
Mainly XBOX Controller
【A】jump . 【X】Light Slash .
【Y】Heavy Slash、Backstab . 【B】Tiger Shadow .
【RB】skill set . 【RT】Sprint . 【LB】Menu . 【LT】Defense .
【RB+A】Tiger Chong . 【RB+X】Tiger Teeth .
【RB+Y】Tiger Claw . 【RB+B】Tiger Shadow Kill . 【LT+RT】Counterattack .


▉ Common Problem
【1】 It is prompted that "○○.dll" does not exist at startup.
Please try installing the "Trial Version" of "Pixel Game Maker MV".

【2】How to open the setting menu.
While the game is running, press the "F1" key to display the menu bar at the top.

【3】How to set language and configure buttons.
When the game is running, press "F1" to open the setting menu, where you can make settings.


▉ Precautions
